item.title: Kenyan MPs accuse British soldiers of sexual abuse and environmental destruction
item.description: A two-year investigation details disturbing accounts of rape, sexual violence, murders and environmental destruction.

item.title: Drunk raccoon found passed out on liquor store floor after breaking in
item.description: The intoxicated animal suffered no injuries and was released back into the wild by animal protection once sober.

item.title: Former EU top diplomat Mogherini accused in fraud investigation
item.description: The inquiry centres on allegations of favouritism in EU funding for a training programme at a school headed by Federica Mogherini.

item.title: Steve Rosenberg: Putin showing no signs of compromise
item.description: The BBC's Russia Editor shares his analysis after five hours of peace talks between the Russians and the US.

item.title: Was it a coup or was it a 'sham'? Behind Guinea-Bissau's military takeover
item.description: The military has taken over but some say the overthrow of the president was not what it seemed.
